reviews.text: Platinum Outdoor Environments - Fences, Patios & Decks

Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"We have a beautiful stone bar area/ outdoor grilling area." "Harley was great to work with."

If you’re in search of a reliable, innovative outdoor patio and pergola company, look no further than Platinum Fence & Patio and Cody. … More Response from the owner 11 months ago Thank you Doug!  We really enjoyed working on your project!

Cody and his team did an amazing job building our dream outdoor kitchen area. With any construction job there's always things that come up but he addressed them quickly and was able to keep the job rolling. The crews always showed up on time and were very respectful. Highly recommend Platinum Outdoor! Response from the owner a year ago Thank you Amanda for the kind words!

Best project ever!!  Cody and his guys did amazing work and were great to work with!  We were well informed throughout the whole process and our turf installation was done perfectly. Our backyard turned out better than I even expected!  Highly,  highly recommend!! Response from the owner 10 months ago Thank you Dayna!  We are so happy that you love your new backyard!
